snippet.textDisplay: That knocking sound at 0:02 scared the absolute shit out of me, it's stereophonically positioned so it sounds like somebody is actually knocking at my door at 2:20 AM. I can't even listen to the rest of the song out of fear of hearing it again and thinking the boogeyman is after me.

snippet.textDisplay: @bushwhacker2k if I could thumbs up your comment any more, i would. The statement you are referring to makes me want to tear my skin off. Yes FFXIII's battle system was nice, and the cutscenes were beautiful. great, they captured two of the nice things about games, but really. no towns, a linear story where you can't revisit areas till the end of the game, little exploration until the end as well.. what were they thinking?!
snippet.textOriginal: @bushwhacker2k if I could thumbs up your comment any more, i would. The statement you are referring to makes me want to tear my skin off. Yes FFXIII's battle system was nice, and the cutscenes were beautiful. great, they captured two of the nice things about games, but really. no towns, a linear story where you can't revisit areas till the end of the game, little exploration until the end as well.. what were they thinking?!

snippet.textDisplay: It's a pretty decent game.  Most that complain about it complain about the slowdowns during gameplay.  You can lower the slowdowns by installing to HDD and if you get it for the PC there will be no slowdowns.
